title: Postpositiot - Postpositions
description: Practice Finnish postpositions ‚Äì location words that follow the noun
instructions: Learn and practice Finnish postpositions in context

structure.description: Postpositions come AFTER the noun. The noun must be in the GENITIVE case.

postpositions.example_en: on the right of the camera
on the left of the door
between the shoes and the banana
in the middle of the room

questions.question: Which word is the postposition?
questions.explanation: takana = behind. Follows talon (genitive of talo). Postpositions always come AFTER the noun.

questions.question: Which word is the postposition?
questions.explanation: alla = under. Follows s√§ngyn (genitive of s√§nky = bed).

questions.question: What does the postposition phrase mean in English?
